# NSAlert.Style.critical

**Case**

An alert style to inform someone about a critical event.

## Declaration

```swift
case critical
```

## Discussion

Use this alert style sparingly and only when extra attention is really needed (for example when confirming an action that may result in the unexpected loss of data).

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSAlert.Style.warning**: An alert style to warn someone about a current or impending event.
- **NSAlert.Style.informational**: An alert style to inform someone about a current or impending event.
